Tunnels and Multi-level Parking Air Monitoring
Helping authorities and pedestrians from overexposure to harmful air pollutants and automating ventilation mechanisms with the trigger system.
Explore Case Studies
“We have installed a large network of OIZOM smart air monitoring sensors across Australia. OIZOM Terminal provides easy access to data, trends, reports, and alerts.”
Ben Payami, Ektimo Pty Ltd, Australia
Tunnels and Multi-level Parking Air Monitoring
Ensuring effective ventilation of tunnels  & parkings
Pollution free tunnels and parking spaces based on real-time air quality data
Adverse weather situations reduce road visibility and can even make roads slippery, which further increases the chances of accidents. It is necessary to take preventive actions and avoid vehicular congestion in Tunnels and Parking lots, which are the hotspots of heavy emissions. Outdoor air pollution monitoring at crossroads, tunnels, and multi-level parking facilities are critically important for ensuring health and safety within the transportation networks. Oizom offers a range of outdoor air pollution monitoring systems that helps authorities in keeping a track of vehicular pollution in the urban city areas and highways. For tunnels, Oizom has Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring System that can provide accurate data on various air pollutants and weather parameters. Based on these data, threshold-based triggers can effectively activate or deactivate the ventilation system within the tunnels. Thus, saving time, effort, and electricity by providing real-time actionable air quality data to the authorities.
Automating Ventilation systems
In built relay for easy integration
Threshold based alerts
Optimise efficiency of ventilation systems
Tunnels and parking slots underground tend to trap high levels of CO, CO2, PM2.5, PM100, etc. Having an effective ventilation system that can release toxic air pollutants is essential to prevent any potential hazards for people as well as vehicles. Oizom’s smart, accurate and robust Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring system is capable of automating the ventilation system. The monitor of in-build relays can trigger the activation or deactivation of the ventilation system based on the safety threshold. Thus, saving the time and effort of the authorities and helping build a safer environment for the workers and the locals.
Automating Ventilation systems
Better Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle Owners
Better Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle Owners
Workplace health and safety
Optimum power consumption
Timely alerts for corrective action
Multi-level parking areas deal with multiple vehicles resulting in vehicular emissions in a trapped or confined area. This leads to dense pockets of pollutants and affects the health of the parking managers and associated staff. To avoid such conditions, multi-level parking areas are equipped with ventilation systems. However, without a real-time air quality monitoring system, the efficiency of such systems cannot be gauged. Oizom’s monitors provide real-time monitoring of vehicular emissions inside a parking lot and provide necessary alerts for the staff. Additionally, the relay-based automation capabilities enable threshold-based triggers for optimum power consumption of the ventilation systems.
Why Tunnel supervisors prefer Oizom?
Automation
2 nos. in-built relays for integrating third-party pollution control equipment with threshold-based triggers increasing efficiency and saving time & labor.
Wired Communication RS 232
All products are equipped with wired connectivity options including RS232 for seamless data communication and uninterrupted monitoring.
Low O&M
Relay based automation enables optimum efficiency of ventilation system leading to less wear & tear and minimal operation and maintenance.
OIZOM Product Range
Air Pollution Monitoring System
Polludrone – an integrated air monitoring systems are an ideal system for real-time outdoor air quality monitoring for Urban and Industrial applications.
Odour Monitoring Equipment
Odosense monitors various odourful and toxic gases in the environment to provide insights for odour dispersion and modelling.
Real-time Ambient Dust Monitor
Dustroid is a particulate monitoring system to measure a wide spectrum of particulate matter sizes for dust laden activities.
Automatic Weather Station
Weathercom is an automatic weather station designed to measure various meteorological conditions.
Changing the way we monitor air quality
Contact us to learn more about our air quality monitoring systems and solutions.

What We Offer
Robust Air Quality Monitor
Oizom offers robust and rugged air quality monitoring systems to withstand harsh environmental conditions. An IP66 certified enclosure along with a strong build ensures monitors work in cold, dry, hot and humid conditions. All Oizom monitors offer complimentary battery backup and data storage in case of losing power and network connectivity respectively. The solutions hence become an ideal choice for Smart City air quality monitoring purposes.
All Products
Robust Air Quality Monitor
Remote Air Quality Data Software
Remote Air Quality Data Software
Developed in-house with user feedback over the years, Envizom – Data visualization and analytics software is an ideal choice for drawing actionable insights from real-time monitors. Modules like Overview and Dashboard give a birds’ eye view of a city monitoring network. Advanced modules like Analytics and Alerts let users take corrective actions. The remote air quality monitoring software also allows device management and one-step data integration.

We OfferRobust Air Quality MonitorOizom offers robust and rugged air quality monitoring systems to withstand harsh environmental conditions. An IP66 certified enclosure along with a strong build ensures monitors work in cold, dry, hot and humid conditions. All Oizom monitors offer complimentary battery backup and data storage in case of losing power and network connectivity respectively. The solutions hence become an ideal choice for Smart City air quality monitoring purposes.All ProductsRobust Air Quality MonitorRemote Air Quality Data SoftwareRemote Air Quality Data SoftwareDeveloped in-house with user feedback over the years, Envizom – Data visualization and analytics software is an ideal choice for drawing actionable insights from real-time monitors. Modules like Overview and Dashboard give a birds’ eye view of a city monitoring network. Advanced modules like Analytics and Alerts let users take corrective actions. sections.site-content: Tunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringHelping authorities and pedestrians from overexposure to harmful air pollutants and automating ventilation mechanisms with the trigger system.Explore Case Studies“We have installed a large network of OIZOM smart air monitoring sensors across Australia. OIZOM Terminal provides easy access to data, trends, reports, and alerts.”Ben Payami, Ektimo Pty Ltd, AustraliaTunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringEnsuring effective ventilation of tunnels  & parkingsPollution free tunnels and parking spaces based on real-time air quality dataAdverse weather situations reduce road visibility and can even make roads slippery, which further increases the chances of accidents. It is necessary to take preventive actions and avoid vehicular congestion in Tunnels and Parking lots, which are the hotspots of heavy emissions. Outdoor air pollution monitoring at crossroads, tunnels, and multi-level parking facilities are critically important for ensuring health and safety within the transportation networks. Oizom offers a range of outdoor air pollution monitoring systems that helps authorities in keeping a track of vehicular pollution in the urban city areas and highways. For tunnels, Oizom has Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring System that can provide accurate data on various air pollutants and weather parameters. Based on these data, threshold-based triggers can effectively activate or deactivate the ventilation system within the tunnels. Thus, saving time, effort, and electricity by providing real-time actionable air quality data to the authorities.Automating Ventilation systemsIn built relay for easy integrationThreshold based alertsOptimise efficiency of ventilation systemsTunnels and parking slots underground tend to trap high levels of CO, CO2, PM2.5, PM100, etc. Having an effective ventilation system that can release toxic air pollutants is essential to prevent any potential hazards for people as well as vehicles. Oizom’s smart, accurate and robust Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring system is capable of automating the ventilation system. The monitor of in-build relays can trigger the activation or deactivation of the ventilation system based on the safety threshold. Thus, saving the time and effort of the authorities and helping build a safer environment for the workers and the locals.Automating Ventilation systemsBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersWorkplace health and safetyOptimum power consumptionTimely alerts for corrective actionMulti-level parking areas deal with multiple vehicles resulting in vehicular emissions in a trapped or confined area. This leads to dense pockets of pollutants and affects the health of the parking managers and associated staff. To avoid such conditions, multi-level parking areas are equipped with ventilation systems. However, without a real-time air quality monitoring system, the efficiency of such systems cannot be gauged. Oizom’s monitors provide real-time monitoring of vehicular emissions inside a parking lot and provide necessary alerts for the staff. Additionally, the relay-based automation capabilities enable threshold-based triggers for optimum power consumption of the ventilation systems.Why Tunnel supervisors prefer Oizom?Automation2 nos. in-built relays for integrating third-party pollution control equipment with threshold-based triggers increasing efficiency and saving time & labor.Wired Communication RS 232All products are equipped with wired connectivity options including RS232 for seamless data communication and uninterrupted monitoring.Low O&MRelay based automation enables optimum efficiency of ventilation system leading to less wear & tear and minimal operation and maintenance.OIZOM Product RangeAir Pollution Monitoring SystemPolludrone – an integrated air monitoring systems are an ideal system for real-time outdoor air quality monitoring for Urban and Industrial applications.Odour Monitoring EquipmentOdosense monitors various odourful and toxic gases in the environment to provide insights for odour dispersion and modelling.Real-time Ambient Dust MonitorDustroid is a particulate monitoring system to measure a wide spectrum of particulate matter sizes for dust laden activities.Automatic Weather StationWeathercom is an automatic weather station designed to measure various meteorological conditions.Changing the way we monitor air qualityContact us to learn more about our air quality monitoring systems and sections.post-20947 usecase type-usecase status-p: Tunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringHelping authorities and pedestrians from overexposure to harmful air pollutants and automating ventilation mechanisms with the trigger system.Explore Case Studies“We have installed a large network of OIZOM smart air monitoring sensors across Australia. OIZOM Terminal provides easy access to data, trends, reports, and alerts.”Ben Payami, Ektimo Pty Ltd, AustraliaTunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringEnsuring effective ventilation of tunnels  & parkingsPollution free tunnels and parking spaces based on real-time air quality dataAdverse weather situations reduce road visibility and can even make roads slippery, which further increases the chances of accidents. It is necessary to take preventive actions and avoid vehicular congestion in Tunnels and Parking lots, which are the hotspots of heavy emissions. Outdoor air pollution monitoring at crossroads, tunnels, and multi-level parking facilities are critically important for ensuring health and safety within the transportation networks. Oizom offers a range of outdoor air pollution monitoring systems that helps authorities in keeping a track of vehicular pollution in the urban city areas and highways. For tunnels, Oizom has Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring System that can provide accurate data on various air pollutants and weather parameters. Based on these data, threshold-based triggers can effectively activate or deactivate the ventilation system within the tunnels. Thus, saving time, effort, and electricity by providing real-time actionable air quality data to the authorities.Automating Ventilation systemsIn built relay for easy integrationThreshold based alertsOptimise efficiency of ventilation systemsTunnels and parking slots underground tend to trap high levels of CO, CO2, PM2.5, PM100, etc. Having an effective ventilation system that can release toxic air pollutants is essential to prevent any potential hazards for people as well as vehicles. Oizom’s smart, accurate and robust Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring system is capable of automating the ventilation system. The monitor of in-build relays can trigger the activation or deactivation of the ventilation system based on the safety threshold. Thus, saving the time and effort of the authorities and helping build a safer environment for the workers and the locals.Automating Ventilation systemsBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersWorkplace health and safetyOptimum power consumptionTimely alerts for corrective actionMulti-level parking areas deal with multiple vehicles resulting in vehicular emissions in a trapped or confined area. This leads to dense pockets of pollutants and affects the health of the parking managers and associated staff. To avoid such conditions, multi-level parking areas are equipped with ventilation systems. However, without a real-time air quality monitoring system, the efficiency of such systems cannot be gauged. Oizom’s monitors provide real-time monitoring of vehicular emissions inside a parking lot and provide necessary alerts for the staff. Additionally, the relay-based automation capabilities enable threshold-based triggers for optimum power consumption of the ventilation systems.Why Tunnel supervisors prefer Oizom?Automation2 nos. in-built relays for integrating third-party pollution control equipment with threshold-based triggers increasing efficiency and saving time & labor.Wired Communication RS 232All products are equipped with wired connectivity options including RS232 for seamless data communication and uninterrupted monitoring.Low O&MRelay based automation enables optimum efficiency of ventilation system leading to less wear & tear and minimal operation and maintenance.OIZOM Product RangeAir Pollution Monitoring SystemPolludrone – an integrated air monitoring systems are an ideal system for real-time outdoor air quality monitoring for Urban and Industrial applications.Odour Monitoring EquipmentOdosense monitors various odourful and toxic gases in the environment to provide insights for odour dispersion and modelling.Real-time Ambient Dust MonitorDustroid is a particulate monitoring system to measure a wide spectrum of particulate matter sizes for dust laden activities.Automatic Weather StationWeathercom is an automatic weather station designed to measure various meteorological conditions.Changing the way we monitor air qualityContact us to learn more about our air quality monitoring systems and sections.elementor elementor-20947: Tunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringHelping authorities and pedestrians from overexposure to harmful air pollutants and automating ventilation mechanisms with the trigger system.Explore Case Studies“We have installed a large network of OIZOM smart air monitoring sensors across Australia. OIZOM Terminal provides easy access to data, trends, reports, and alerts.”Ben Payami, Ektimo Pty Ltd, AustraliaTunnels and Multi-level Parking Air MonitoringEnsuring effective ventilation of tunnels  & parkingsPollution free tunnels and parking spaces based on real-time air quality dataAdverse weather situations reduce road visibility and can even make roads slippery, which further increases the chances of accidents. It is necessary to take preventive actions and avoid vehicular congestion in Tunnels and Parking lots, which are the hotspots of heavy emissions. Outdoor air pollution monitoring at crossroads, tunnels, and multi-level parking facilities are critically important for ensuring health and safety within the transportation networks. Oizom offers a range of outdoor air pollution monitoring systems that helps authorities in keeping a track of vehicular pollution in the urban city areas and highways. For tunnels, Oizom has Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring System that can provide accurate data on various air pollutants and weather parameters. Based on these data, threshold-based triggers can effectively activate or deactivate the ventilation system within the tunnels. Thus, saving time, effort, and electricity by providing real-time actionable air quality data to the authorities.Automating Ventilation systemsIn built relay for easy integrationThreshold based alertsOptimise efficiency of ventilation systemsTunnels and parking slots underground tend to trap high levels of CO, CO2, PM2.5, PM100, etc. Having an effective ventilation system that can release toxic air pollutants is essential to prevent any potential hazards for people as well as vehicles. Oizom’s smart, accurate and robust Tunnel Air Quality Monitoring system is capable of automating the ventilation system. The monitor of in-build relays can trigger the activation or deactivation of the ventilation system based on the safety threshold. Thus, saving the time and effort of the authorities and helping build a safer environment for the workers and the locals.Automating Ventilation systemsBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersWorkplace health and safetyOptimum power consumptionTimely alerts for corrective actionMulti-level parking areas deal with multiple vehicles resulting in vehicular emissions in a trapped or confined area. This leads to dense pockets of pollutants and affects the health of the parking managers and associated staff. To avoid such conditions, multi-level parking areas are equipped with ventilation systems. However, without a real-time air quality monitoring system, the efficiency of such systems cannot be gauged. Oizom’s monitors provide real-time monitoring of vehicular emissions inside a parking lot and provide necessary alerts for the staff. Additionally, the relay-based automation capabilities enable threshold-based triggers for optimum power consumption of the ventilation systems.Why Tunnel supervisors prefer Oizom?Automation2 nos. sections.has_ae_slider elementor-section elemento: Better Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersBetter Health for Parking Managers & Vehicle OwnersWorkplace health and safetyOptimum power consumptionTimely alerts for corrective actionMulti-level parking areas deal with multiple vehicles resulting in vehicular emissions in a trapped or confined area. This leads to dense pockets of pollutants and affects the health of the parking managers and associated staff. To avoid such conditions, multi-level parking areas are equipped with ventilation systems. However, without a real-time air quality monitoring system, the efficiency of such systems cannot be gauged. Oizom’s monitors provide real-time monitoring of vehicular emissions inside a parking lot and provide necessary alerts for the staff. Additionally, the relay-based automation capabilities enable threshold-based triggers for optimum power consumption of the ventilation systems.

sections.has_ae_slider elementor-section elemento: Robust Air Quality MonitorOizom offers robust and rugged air quality monitoring systems to withstand harsh environmental conditions. An IP66 certified enclosure along with a strong build ensures monitors work in cold, dry, hot and humid conditions. All Oizom monitors offer complimentary battery backup and data storage in case of losing power and network connectivity respectively. The solutions hence become an ideal choice for Smart City air quality monitoring purposes.All ProductsRobust Air Quality Monitor

sections.has_ae_slider elementor-section elemento: Remote Air Quality Data SoftwareRemote Air Quality Data SoftwareDeveloped in-house with user feedback over the years, Envizom – Data visualization and analytics software is an ideal choice for drawing actionable insights from real-time monitors. The remote air quality monitoring software also allows device management and one-step data integration.Know more
